title: SDK documentation
description: Expand the SDK documentation with comprehensive guides, examples, and API reference. The current README.md provides a good foundation, but needs more detail on advanced usage, configuration options, custom scorers, and integration patterns.
acceptance_criteria: Complete API reference for all public exports
Guide for creating custom scorers with examples
Guide for integrating with popular agent frameworks (LangChain, CrewAI, etc.)
CI/CD integration examples (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
Migration guide from other eval tools (if applicable)
implementation_notes: Start by reviewing all public exports in src/index.ts
Document the CLI commands in detail (npx neon eval options)
Consider using typedoc or similar for auto-generated API docs
Ensure examples are tested and work with current code
